Hi,

Thanks for your explanation. As far as I know, Prism does not provide any specific guidance or functionality regarding the focus of UI elements as out of the box.

As a possible approach, you could inject the views in your RadDocking region by performing navigation requests and passing a specific parameter as part of the URL (for example, a "SetFocus" parameter.) Then you could implement the INavigationAware interface in the views and in the NavigatedTo method check the aforementioned parameter to determine if the view should be "focused" or not.

Also, I believe you might find the following thread useful, where different approaches and resources about a similar topic are provided:

  • Setting initial control focus
